sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The gcc package contains c++, c++filt, cpp, g++, g77, gcc, gccbug, gcov, glob, gnat, gnatbind, gnatbl, gnatchop, gnatfind, gnatkr, gnatlink, gnatls, gnatmake, gnatprep, gnatpsta, gnatpsys, gnatxref and gcc libraries.

sect2.title: Description

sect3.title: g77
sect3.para: g77 is the fortran compiler invoked by gcc.
